item.title: 30 Bingeworthy Young Adult Films and TV Shows Released in Recent Years
item.description: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty,’ ‘Never Have I Ever,’ ‘We Were Liars,’ ‘Elite’ and ‘My Fault: London’ are among popular projects that recently hit screens.

item.title: Lola Tung Is Ready for ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Fans to Be Surprised
item.description: The actress, who is about to wrap up her turn as Belly in the third and final season of creator-author Jenny Han’s beloved series, is feeling all the emotions as she looks back but also ahead at what'

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Warns Fans Will Be Banned for Any “Hate Speech or Bullying” Against Cast, Crew Amid Season 3 Premiere
item.description: The Prime Video series posted a message its social media accounts ahead of the Jenny Han series’ premiere on Wednesday.
